banner_details:
This banner features a sophisticated and feminine design to promote a jewelry product. The background consists of a soft diagonal gradient blending blush pink shades with subtle abstract patterns and dotted accents, giving a delicate and luxurious feel. The design includes two headline text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in an elegant serif font that command attention at the top left. A bold subheading ("subheading") introduces the product title, followed by a descriptive bullet list ("description") outlining the product features. A brief promotional line ("tagline") adds further appeal. Featured prominently is the price ("price") and a call-to-action ("cta") within a rose-colored button ("cta_background"). On the right side, a product image ("product_image") anchors the visual focus. Decorative elements like a slim separator ("decorative") enhance alignment and structure.

**Color Palette:**
- Rosewood (#8E3646)
- Blush Pink (#F9E5E8)
- Warm Rose (#FBDBE2)
- Dusty Pink (#C15B72)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a delicate pair of earrings with a soft color palette that blends elegance and femininity. Dominant colors include a shimmering **rose gold (#E9A6A2)** for the base metal, complemented by the **petal pink (#FAD2CF)** in the enamel center. Sparkling **diamond white (#FFFFFF)** and **crystal clear (#DFF3F8)** stones add contrast and vibrance, making the design pop. The rose gold frames and connects the pink and clear elements, creating harmony while emphasizing the floral motif. Highlighted edges and reflections bring out a luxurious sheen. For an advertisement banner, use this soft, pastel palette with well-placed white and gold accents.
